org.soulwing.ssl

Interface KeyStoreConfiguration<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KeyStoreBuilder, KeyStoreSubBuilder

    public interface KeyStoreConfiguration<T>
    A configuration for a KeyStore builder.
    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T location(String location)
      Configures the key store location.
      T location(String location, Class<?> relativeToClass)
      Configures the key store location.
      T location(String location, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Configures the key store location.
      T location(URI location)
      Configures the key store location.
      T location(URL location)
      Configures the key store location.
      T password(char[] password)
      Configures the key store password.
      T password(String password)
      Configures the key store password.
      T provider(Provider provider)
      Configures the JCA provider that will produce the key store.
      T provider(String providerName)
      Configures the name of the JCA provider that will produce the key store.
      T type(String type)
      Configures the key store type.

    • Method Detail

      • type

        T type(String type)
        Configures the key store type.
        Parameters:
        type - key store type (e.g. JKS)
        Returns:
        this builder

        Configures the name of the JCA provider that will produce the key store.

      • location

        T location(URL location)
        Configures the key store location.
        Parameters:
        location - URL that specifies the location of the key store
        Returns:
        this builder

      • location

        T location(URI location)
        Configures the key store location.
        Parameters:
        location - URI that specifies the location of the key store; the URI may use the classpath: pseudo-scheme to specify the location of the key store relative to the root of the thread context class loader
        Returns:
        this builder

      • location

        T location(String location)
        Configures the key store location.
        Parameters:
        location - URI or path that specifies the location of the key store; if a URI the classpath: pseudo-scheme specifies the location of the key store relative to the root of the thread context class loader
        Returns:
        this builder

      • location

        T location(String location,
           Class<?> relativeToClass)
        Configures the key store location.
        Parameters:
        location - path to the key store resource relative to relativeToClass
        relativeToClass - base class path location; its class loader will be used to access the resource
        Returns:
        this builder

      • location

        T location(String location,
           ClassLoader classLoader)
        Configures the key store location.
        Parameters:
        location - path to the key store resource relative to the root of classLoader
        classLoader - that will be used to access the resource
        Returns:
        this builder
